results.title: Mirror, mirror: girls, self esteem & physical activity
results.creator_credit: John Gall, Gabrielle Kelly and Adelaide College of TAFE
results.brief_description: A program for students, parents and teachers on factors affecting the participation of girls and women in physical activity - for example, self esteem, body image, expectations and modelling.

results.title: Return to Botany Bay
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
results.brief_description: Intersperses 1987 documentary footage of the re-enactment of the voyage of the First Fleet with Trevor Lunn interviewing an Australia Post representative discussing their role in the Bi-centennial re-enactment and production of the commemorative stamp series.

results.title: STD's . . . Not just long distance phone calls
results.creator_credit: Wendy Thompson, Sabina Wynn and New South Wales. Dept. of Health
results.brief_description: An entertaining look at the ways in which sexually transmitted diseases are transmitted and how they can (mostly) be cured. Looks at what happens at an STD clinic and encourages the use of condoms to prevent STDs.

results.title: OTC memories
results.brief_description: A compilation on the OTC television commercial featuring the theme “Memories” It includes Greece, Netherlands, Germany, Italy and many other countries.No other credits available.

results.title: Looking at Puffing Billy
results.brief_description: An enthusiasts video production about the Puffing Billy railway beginning with a brief history of the line, its relatively recent retoration, and the work of the Puffing Bily Preservation Society. We are taken on a detailed trip along the line from Belgrave to Emerald Lake.
results.description: An enthusiasts video production about the Puffing Billy railway beginning with a brief history of the line, its relatively recent retoration, and the work of the Puffing Bily Preservation Society. We are taken on a detailed trip along the line from Belgrave to Emerald Lake.

results.title: Let's not say goodbye
results.creator_credit: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development

results.title: Show me English: enrolling in class [episode 8]
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, David Ferris, Trevor Lunn and Victoria. Ministry of Education
results.brief_description: A series of programmes which aim to help adult migrants communicate in everyday situations. Tina decides to enrol in English classes following a successful association with Sue, her home tutor. Home tutor program by the Adult Migrant Information Service.
